About Me

Pinrong Chen

My name is Pinrong Chen, but I also go by Cynthia. I am a junior at Staten Island Technical High School. I was born in September and I am the oldest of three with two younger brothers. Some of my favorite things to do during my free time are watching tv shows and movies, bake, hangout with friends, or sleep. I am very new to the world of coding and hope to learn much more.
